Shell command: Not part of the language standard. Commonly done by compiler provided packages or by interfacing to C or POSIX.<ref name=Ada_Execute_Command></ref>

Execute program: exec.Run(path' ' argv' ' envv' ' dir'  exec.DevNull  exec.DevNull  exec.DevNull)'

Shell command: Sys.command command  Unix.open_process_full command env (stdout  stdin  stderr) ...
Execute program: Unix.create_process prog args new_stdin new_stdout new_stderr  ...
Replace current program with new execute: Unix.execv prog args or Unix.execve prog args env

Shell command: system(command')' or $output = `command'`' or exec(command')' or passthru(command')'
